page.title: 04Trade in Wilton
page.content: There are{25 shops in Wilton}. Each{Thursday}a small general{market} is held in the{Market Square.} We conducted a{survey}in Wilton to discover what people thought about the shops in the town. Are there enough shops? Yes said most Was the market held on enough days? Many said they would like it twice a week. Did they think there were enough market stalls? Yes said most. What did they think about the quality of food sold in the market? Most thought good. Was the variety of goods sold in the market wide enough? Yes replied most.
